name: Run Gun and Robots
description:
Run Gun and Robots is a game where you try to get through levels as fast as possible while shooting robots using an in depth movement system.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Slide

Mouse - Look/Shoot

Escape - Pause

Control - Walk (Very Pointless)

(As a side note, the game is controller compatible besides in menus)

Music is by DJ CactusJuice, Song can be found here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sMXCP_VDefU
